::DarkMouse::

"You are in the lab of the Predacon base under Megatron." She looked 
at Dracona. "Are you feeling OK? I know we banged you up a bit, but 
you should recover within a short while. Why did you come here? Why 
did you attack? Surely you knew that coming here alone was suicide?"
For some strange reason, she cared about this Maximal.  For some 
strange reason, she didn't want harm to come to this brave 
Maximal.Why did she care went racing through her mind.
She knew these thoughts were trouble and if Megatron knew she thought 
that way, she was as good as scrap.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "THECODE" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> Sinesis and Sinister walked up and looked at her. They laughed and 
walked
> away whispering something. Dracona wakes up and looks around.
> 
> "What is this shabby place?" Dracona asks...
